mc.name: Armillary Sphere
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages--until now.

mc.name: Nacatl Hunt-Pride
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance
{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
mc.flavorText: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

mc.name: Worldly Counsel
mc.oracleText: Domain- Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText: Domain Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.flavorText: Every horizon hides a new possibility.

mc.name: Rupture Spire
mc.oracleText:
Rupture Spire comes into play tapped.
When Rupture Spire comes into play, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Rupture Spire comes into play tapped.
When Rupture Spire comes into play, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Reliquary Tower
mc.oracleText:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: When the aven scouts located the tower in Esper, the Knights of the Reliquary set off on a righteous crusade to recover their lost treasures.

mc.name: Might of Alara
mc.oracleText: Domain- Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: The combined strength of all five planes spawned creations none had seen before.

mc.name: Asha's Favor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.
mc.flavorText: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

mc.name: Rotting Rats
mc.oracleText:
When Rotting Rats comes into play, each player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
When Rotting Rats comes into play, each player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Voices from the Void
mc.oracleText: Domain- Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: As Grixis collided with the rest of Alara, the worlds began to hear the hateful whispers of the forgotten dead.

mc.name: Aerie Mystics
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{1}{G}{U}: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{G}{U}: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: They are cautious with their body language and facial expressions. Any stray movement could betray the positions of the troops they protect and cost many lives.

mc.name: Inkwell Leviathan
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk, trample, shroud
mc.printedText: Islandwalk, trample, shroud
mc.flavorText:
"Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."
--Esper fable

mc.name: Infectious Horror
mc.oracleText: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

mc.name: Mirror-Sigil Sergeant
mc.oracleText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue permanent, you may put a token into play that's a copy of Mirror-Sigil Sergeant.
mc.printedText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue permanent, you may put a token into play that's a copy of Mirror-Sigil Sergeant.
mc.flavorText: "If I had many lives, I would give them all for Bant."

mc.name: Bloodhall Ooze
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
mc.flavorText: A drop of blood spilled from the first dragon.

mc.name: Cliffrunner Behemoth
mc.oracleText:
Cliffrunner Behemoth has haste as long as you control a red permanent.
Cliffrunner Behemoth has lifelink as long as you control a white permanent.
mc.printedText:
Cliffrunner Behemoth has haste as long as you control a red permanent.
Cliffrunner Behemoth has lifelink as long as you control a white permanent.
mc.flavorText: It's revered for its power, celebrated for its grace, and feared for the avalanches triggered by its thunderous feet.

mc.name: Dreadwing
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}{R}: Dreadwing gets +3/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}{R}: Dreadwing gets +3/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Dreadwings spring from lofty perches to surprise kathari in midflight. They smother their prey and then consume it as they glide gently toward the ground.

mc.name: Rhox Meditant
mc.oracleText: When Rhox Meditant comes into play, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.
mc.printedText: When Rhox Meditant comes into play, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The weight of her conviction balances on the harmony of her soul.

mc.name: Toxic Iguanar
mc.oracleText: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Whenever it deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
mc.printedText: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Whenever it deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
mc.flavorText: There are no "weak" creatures on Jund. Even the smallest can strike a deadly blow.

mc.name: Jhessian Balmgiver
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{T}: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{T}: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: "You have two choices: heed my advice now or need my healing later."

mc.name: Scepter of Dominance
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Tap target permanent.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Tap target permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"Whether or not you will bow to me is not open to debate. The question is, will I ever let you rise?"
--Fridius, telemin master

mc.name: Hellspark Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Wretched Banquet
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures in play.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures in play.
mc.flavorText:
"The meek inherit nothing."
--Sedris, the Traitor King

mc.name: Skyward Eye Prophets
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
{T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance
{T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
mc.flavorText: They lament the doom that is coming to Bant without realizing the part their own leaders have played in it.

mc.name: Parasitic Strix
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix comes into play, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix comes into play, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

mc.name: Lapse of Certainty
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

mc.name: Shard Convergence
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Alara is broken no more.

mc.name: Ethersworn Adjudicator
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{1}{W}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
{2}{U}: Untap Ethersworn Adjudicator.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{W}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
{2}{U}: Untap Ethersworn Adjudicator.
mc.flavorText: Esper mages devised their weapons to be so devastating that war seemed unnecessary.

mc.name: Worldheart Phoenix
mc.oracleText:
Flying
You may play Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Flying
You may play Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.

mc.name: Rhox Bodyguard
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Rhox Bodyguard comes into play, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Rhox Bodyguard comes into play, you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: An enlightened soul caged in a body made for battle.

mc.name: Grixis Illusionist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

mc.name: Beacon Behemoth
mc.oracleText: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

mc.name: Unsummon
mc.oracleText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Send it back to its own strange world so we can avoid another inglorious combat with these wicked beings."
--Captain Valek of Jhess

mc.name: Kranioceros
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"A surly beast, the kranioceros will raise its defenses at the smallest threat. Stay out of sight and downwind, or you'll disrupt its natural migrations."
--Ebrel, godtoucher mentor

mc.name: Martial Coup
mc.oracleText: Put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens into play. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
mc.printedText: Put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens into play. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
mc.flavorText: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

mc.name: Path to Exile
mc.oracleText: Remove target creature from the game. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle his or her library.
mc.printedText: Remove target creature from the game. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

mc.name: Drag Down
mc.oracleText: Domain- Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

mc.name: Viashino Slaughtermaster
mc.oracleText:
Double strike
{B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Double strike
{B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: "I'll fight two at once, and then lick their guts from my blades."

mc.name: Matca Rioters
mc.oracleText: Domain- Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

mc.name: Master Transmuter
mc.oracleText: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

mc.name: Salvage Slasher
mc.oracleText: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Esper artificers never imagined that one day their scraps would be pressed against their soft and fragile throats.

mc.name: Noble Hierarch
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

mc.name: Conflux
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

mc.name: Charnelhoard Wurm
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Charnelhoard Wurm deals damage to an opponent, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Whenever Charnelhoard Wurm deals damage to an opponent, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Jund's dragons hoard only sangrite crystals. Its wurms aren't so picky.

mc.name: Filigree Fracture
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent was blue or black, draw a card.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent was blue or black, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The sphinx tyrannized Bant until a rhox mage tested the hardiness of her shiny parts.

mc.name: Quenchable Fire
mc.oracleText: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless he or she pays {U} before that step.
mc.printedText: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless he or she pays {U} before that step.
mc.flavorText: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

mc.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
mc.oracleText:
+3: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
-2: Gain control of target creature.
-9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.
mc.printedText:
+3: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
-2: Gain control of target creature.
-9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

mc.name: Fusion Elemental
mc.flavorText: As the shards merged into the Maelstrom, their mana energies fused into new monstrosities.

mc.name: Goblin Razerunners
mc.oracleText:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners.
At the end of your turn, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player.
mc.printedText:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners.
At the end of your turn, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player.
mc.flavorText: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

mc.name: Sacellum Archers
mc.oracleText: {R}{W}, {T}: Sacellum Archers deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {R}{W}, {T}: Sacellum Archers deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText: "Our arrows are aimed not at the sacred behemoths but at those who dare to dream of such a trophy."

mc.name: Wild Leotau
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.
mc.flavorText:
"Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm."
--Rafiq of the Many

mc.name: Progenitus
mc.oracleText:
Protection from everything
If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
mc.printedText:
Protection from everything
If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
mc.flavorText: The Soul of the World has returned.

Flash

mc.printedText:
Flash
Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

Target player gains 8 life.

mc.flavorText: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

mc.name: Grixis Slavedriver
mc.oracleText:
When Grixis Slavedriver leaves play, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token into play.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Paragon of the Amesha
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Paragon of the Amesha becomes an Angel, gets +3/+3, and gains flying and lifelink.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Paragon of the Amesha becomes an Angel, gets +3/+3, and gains flying and lifelink.
mc.flavorText: "Let my lance sing with the voices of angels and the heathen cower before my shield, for I will teach this land the meaning of honor."

mc.name: Fleshformer
mc.oracleText: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Fleshformer gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Fleshformer gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.flavorText: Necromancers who discovered the new sources of mana were quick to dream up new nightmares with them.

mc.name: Meglonoth
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Meglonoth blocks a creature, Meglonoth deals damage to that creature's controller equal to Meglonoth's power.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Meglonoth blocks a creature, Meglonoth deals damage to that creature's controller equal to Meglonoth's power.
mc.flavorText: When the shards merged, Mayael found herself the general of Naya's mightiest army.

mc.name: Yoke of the Damned
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When a creature is put into a graveyard from play, destroy enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
When a creature is put into a graveyard from play, destroy enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

mc.name: Magister Sphinx
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Magister Sphinx comes into play, target player's life total becomes 10.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Magister Sphinx comes into play, target player's life total becomes 10.
mc.flavorText: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

mc.name: Brackwater Elemental
mc.oracleText:
When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of turn.
Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of turn.

mc.name: Esperzoa
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

mc.name: Manaforce Mace
mc.oracleText:
Domain- Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
Equip {3}
mc.printedText:
Domain Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
Equip {3}
mc.flavorText: As the shards merged, relics once thought mundane regained forgotten powers.

mc.name: Knotvine Mystic
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The elves of Naya were the last to acknowledge the massive shift of mana in their world.

mc.name: Blood Tyrant
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way.
Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.
mc.printedText:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way.
Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.

mc.name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying into play.
mc.flavorText: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

mc.name: Constricting Tendrils
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: Priests of Bant protect their temples with traps more elaborate than any mosaic floor.

mc.name: Volcanic Fallout
mc.oracleText:
Volcanic Fallout can't be countered.
Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
Volcanic Fallout can't be countered.
Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText:
"How can we outrun the sky?"
--Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

mc.name: Aven Trailblazer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Domain- Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Domain Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"The bird wore the form of a man, bereft of filigree. Why do the Texts not speak of it?"
--Belator of Esper

mc.name: Wandering Goblins
mc.oracleText: Domain- {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: Tired of waiting for a dragon to eat them, some hardy goblins struck out to become meals for the unknown.

mc.name: Cumber Stone
mc.oracleText: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
mc.printedText: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
mc.flavorText:
"The stone is more potent than ever. The flesh that creeps into our land will become even more slovenly and weak."
--Niclavs, archmage of Esper

mc.name: Darklit Gargoyle
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{B}: Darklit Gargoyle gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{B}: Darklit Gargoyle gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It shines in the darkness of its master's ambitions.

mc.name: Thornling
mc.oracleText:
{G}: Thornling gains haste until end of turn.
{G}: Thornling gains trample until end of turn.
{G}: Thornling is indestructible this turn.
{1}: Thornling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Thornling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{G}: Thornling gains haste until end of turn.
{G}: Thornling gains trample until end of turn.
{G}: Thornling is indestructible this turn.
{1}: Thornling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Thornling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Vagrant Plowbeasts
mc.oracleText: {1}: Regenerate target creature with power 5 or greater.
mc.printedText: {1}: Regenerate target creature with power 5 or greater.
mc.flavorText: Plowbeasts of Naya escaped their harnesses in droves, content to snack on the conveniently cultivated fields of Eos and Valeron.

mc.name: Suicidal Charge
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.
mc.flavorText:
"They think they're winning. But they're just lining up to be dinner."
--Rakka Mar

mc.name: Child of Alara
mc.oracleText:
Trample
When Child of Alara is put into a graveyard from play, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
Trample
When Child of Alara is put into a graveyard from play, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: The progeny of the Maelstrom shows no allegiance--and no mercy--to any of the five shards.

mc.name: Sedraxis Alchemist
mc.oracleText: When Sedraxis Alchemist comes into play, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: When Sedraxis Alchemist comes into play, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: The problem with a liquid that can dissolve anything is finding something to carry it in.

mc.name: Court Homunculus
mc.oracleText: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
mc.printedText: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
mc.flavorText: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

mc.name: Faerie Mechanist
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist comes into play, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist comes into play, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mc.name: Maniacal Rage
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
mc.flavorText: The spikes of sangrite made the goblin stronger, but they didn't make him any smarter.

mc.name: Obelisk of Alara
mc.oracleText:
{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life.
{1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player.
{1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life.
{1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player.
{1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

mc.name: Sludge Strider
mc.oracleText: Whenever another artifact comes into play under your control or another artifact you control leaves play, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever another artifact comes into play under your control or another artifact you control leaves play, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

mc.name: Nacatl Savage
mc.oracleText: Protection from artifacts
mc.printedText: Protection from artifacts
mc.flavorText:
"Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs."
--Ajani

mc.name: Elder Mastery
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
mc.flavorText: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

mc.name: Scarland Thrinax
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Scarland Thrinax.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Scarland Thrinax.
mc.flavorText:
"There is only one way of life in Jund: feed on the weak until you are cut down by something stronger."
--Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

mc.name: Controlled Instincts
mc.oracleText:
Enchant red or green creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.printedText:
Enchant red or green creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.flavorText: Togk Manytooth struggled helplessly as the kathari circled above him. For a warrior, immobilization is a fate worse than death.

mc.name: Corrupted Roots
mc.oracleText:
Enchant Forest or Plains
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Enchant Forest or Plains
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
mc.flavorText: The bones of Jund's dead resurfaced in Naya, poisoning the jungle and killing the sunseeders' crops.

mc.name: Celestial Purge
mc.oracleText: Remove target black or red permanent from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove target black or red permanent from the game.
mc.flavorText:
"This new chaos confounds us. We must fling it into our winds, our storms. These we can control."
--Bezzit Plar, Esper stormcaller

mc.name: Ignite Disorder
mc.oracleText: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of target white and/or blue creatures.
mc.printedText: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of target white and/or blue creatures.
mc.flavorText: "Bant is a world imprisoned by polished stone and tyrannical rule. It yearns to strike back against those who restrain it."

mc.name: View from Above
mc.oracleText: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If you control a white permanent, return View from Above to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If you control a white permanent, return View from Above to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "This air feels so heavy and thick. There are no winds to speak of. I fear the knowledge that comes from a place like this."

mc.name: Vectis Agents
mc.oracleText: {U}{B}: Vectis Agents gets -2/-0 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText: {U}{B}: Vectis Agents gets -2/-0 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: With their life energy suppressed under their etherium enhancements, thieves from Esper found it surprisingly easy to explore the ruins of Grixis.

mc.name: Apocalypse Hydra
mc.oracleText:
Apocalypse Hydra comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it comes into play with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: Apocalypse Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Apocalypse Hydra comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it comes into play with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: Apocalypse Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Esper Cormorants
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"The smiths of this land must be mad to reach so far and so high for another creature to decorate."
--Cagen Vargan, Jhessian sea scout

mc.name: Valiant Guard
mc.flavorText: As the outsiders invaded Bant, soldiers who once saw sigils as the highest marks of glory began to see the scars of battle as tokens of equal worth.

mc.name: Molten Frame
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target artifact creature.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Destroy target artifact creature.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

mc.name: Scepter of Insight
mc.oracleText: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"The road to truth has many branches, and so must the cane with which I walk it."
--Voln the Elder

mc.name: Ember Weaver
mc.oracleText:
Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
mc.printedText:
Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
mc.flavorText:
"Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
--Sunseeder myth

mc.name: Shambling Remains
mc.oracleText:
Shambling Remains can't block.
Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Shambling Remains can't block.
Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Aven Squire
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

mc.name: Frontline Sage
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.flavorText: The battle was won in the commander's head before the first weapon was drawn.

mc.name: Canyon Minotaur
mc.flavorText: On Jund, the deep canyons were the best places to hide. When the goblins wandered into Naya, they found that was not so true.

mc.name: Tukatongue Thallid
mc.oracleText: When Tukatongue Thallid is put into a graveyard from play, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
mc.printedText: When Tukatongue Thallid is put into a graveyard from play, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

mc.name: Maelstrom Archangel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may play a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may play a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost.
mc.flavorText: There is no world where angels fear to tread.

mc.name: Soul's Majesty
mc.oracleText: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.
mc.printedText: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.
mc.flavorText: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

mc.name: Zombie Outlander
mc.oracleText: Protection from green
mc.printedText: Protection from green
mc.flavorText: The ripe smell of life drifted into Grixis. The dead caught the scent and with reckless hunger followed it back into Jund.

mc.name: Nacatl Outlander
mc.oracleText: Protection from blue
mc.printedText: Protection from blue
mc.flavorText: Survival in the wilds of Naya left Tiyan well equipped to win the civilized battles of Bant.

mc.name: Vedalken Outlander
mc.oracleText: Protection from red
mc.printedText: Protection from red
mc.flavorText: The Seekers of Carmot searched across the unknown lands for the mystical red stone that could reforge Esper in ethereal perfection.

mc.name: Goblin Outlander
mc.oracleText: Protection from white
mc.printedText: Protection from white
mc.flavorText: Egbol stared in wonder at Naya's landscape. So much to eat. So much to steal.

mc.name: Dark Temper
mc.oracleText: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.
mc.printedText: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.
mc.flavorText: When you've got the temperament of a dragon, every argument is one you'll win.

mc.name: Valeron Outlander
mc.oracleText: Protection from black
mc.printedText: Protection from black
mc.flavorText: After years of honing her philosophy in debate with stubborn rhoxes, Niella was ready to convert any heathen.

mc.name: Rakka Mar
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste into play.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste into play.
mc.flavorText:
"The finest pawns are those with pawns of their own."
--Nicol Bolas

mc.name: Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer
mc.oracleText:
{W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.
Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.
mc.printedText:
{W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.
Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.
mc.flavorText: "Everyone has a price."

mc.name: Malfegor
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Malfegor comes into play, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Malfegor comes into play, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.
mc.flavorText: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

mc.name: Scattershot Archer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: To train her elves for war, Mayael would drop a sackful of acorns from the tree canopy. Each archer tried to split as many as possible before the acorns hit the forest floor below.

mc.name: Spore Burst
mc.oracleText: Domain- Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: Seeds from Jund don't drift gently on the wind. They get up and stampede.

mc.name: Countersquall
mc.oracleText: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.printedText: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Each of the twenty-three winds of Esper is named and chronicled, and every possible interaction with the flow of magic is exhaustively detailed.

mc.name: Scornful ther-Lich
mc.oracleText: {W}{B}: Scornful ther-Lich gains fear and vigilance until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}{B}: Scornful Aether-Lich gains fear and vigilance until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"With no flesh, there is no pain, no hesitation, no emotion of any kind. He is crafted perfection."
--Tezzeret

mc.name: Voracious Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Voracious Dragon comes into play, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Voracious Dragon comes into play, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

mc.name: Dragonsoul Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.
mc.flavorText: The farther he roamed from Jund and its dragons, the more he felt their essence in himself.

mc.name: Banefire
mc.oracleText:
Banefire deals X damage to target creature or player.
If X is 5 or more, Banefire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
mc.printedText:
Banefire deals X damage to target creature or player.
If X is 5 or more, Banefire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
mc.flavorText: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

mc.name: Giltspire Avenger
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
mc.flavorText: "To trespass so far from home is to ask for a lonesome grave."

mc.name: Mark of Asylum
mc.oracleText: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
mc.flavorText: A paragon of honor, Galo Aher fell to a blast of fire. The Order of the White Orchid was so saddened that they forged a new sigil in his likeness.

mc.name: Nyxathid
mc.oracleText:
As Nyxathid comes into play, choose an opponent.
Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.
mc.printedText:
As Nyxathid comes into play, choose an opponent.
Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.
mc.flavorText: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.

mc.name: Unstable Frontier
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The goblins went to sleep in Jund and awoke in Grixis. They'd never seen a zombie before. They would never see one again.

mc.name: Sphinx Summoner
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Sphinx Summoner comes into play, you may search your library for an artifact creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Sphinx Summoner comes into play, you may search your library for an artifact creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Kederekt Parasite
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.
mc.flavorText: When the smell of passing thoughts piques its hunger, its maw becomes primed with acid and a taste for brains.

mc.name: Cylian Sunsinger
mc.oracleText: {R}{G}{W}: Cylian Sunsinger and each other creature with the same name as it get +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}{G}{W}: Cylian Sunsinger and each other creature with the same name as it get +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "The sun shines bright upon the strong."

mc.name: Extractor Demon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever another creature leaves play, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever another creature leaves play, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to play. It gains haste. Remove it from the game at end of turn or if it would leave play. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Scepter of Fugue
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.flavorText: One goes to Tidehollow either to forget or to be forgotten. Either way, the scullers will oblige.

mc.name: Telemin Performance
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. That player puts all noncreature cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard, then you put the creature card into play under your control.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. That player puts all noncreature cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard, then you put the creature card into play under your control.

mc.name: Knight of the Reliquary
mc.oracleText:
Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it into play, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it into play, then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend."
--Elspeth

mc.name: Hellkite Hatchling
mc.oracleText:
Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Hellkite Hatchling has flying and trample if it devoured a creature.
mc.printedText:
Devour 1 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Hellkite Hatchling has flying and trample if it devoured a creature.
mc.flavorText: A killing machine from birth.

mc.name: Font of Mythos
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards.
mc.flavorText: Those who drink from Malfegor's cup are tainted with hunger and stained with lies.

mc.name: Mana Cylix
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Those who dismiss the cylix as an ordinary wooden bowl are blind to the true measure of its worth.

mc.name: Bone Saw
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.flavorText: In a world where death is always violent, cruel weapons are as common as rocks.

mc.name: Ancient Ziggurat
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to play creature spells.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to play creature spells.
mc.flavorText: Built in honor of Alara's creatures, the ziggurat vanished long ago. When Progenitus awakened, the temple emerged again.

mc.name: Kaleidostone
mc.oracleText:
When Kaleidostone comes into play, draw a card.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kaleidostone: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
When Kaleidostone comes into play, draw a card.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kaleidostone: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Once broken, who knows what worlds might grow from its shards?

mc.name: Exotic Orchard
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
mc.flavorText:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
--Pulan, Bant orchardist

mc.name: Exploding Borders
mc.oracleText: Domain- Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle your library. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Domain Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle your library. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: Reuniting a world is not a gentle process.

mc.name: Paleoloth
mc.oracleText: Whenever another creature with power 5 or greater comes into play under your control, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Whenever another creature with power 5 or greater comes into play under your control, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Gods do not sleep soundly in the earth's embrace."
--Mayael the Anima

mc.name: Wall of Reverence
mc.oracleText:
Defender, flying
At the end of your turn, you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.
mc.printedText:
Defender, flying
At the end of your turn, you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.
mc.flavorText: The lives of elves are long, but their memories are longer. Even after death, they do not desert their homes.
